biotools.summary: ICSNPathway is a web tool for the identification of candidate causal SNPs and their corresponding candidate causal pathways from genome wide association studies. ISCNPathway integrates linkage disequilibrium analysis, functional SNP annotation and pathway based analysis to identify these SNPs and pathways.
